Profile of AKC HUB Pvt Ltd

M/s Ananta Krriyaa Creative HUB Pvt Ltd has been incorporated on 05 of September 2016 vide CIN : U74999MH2016PTC285554. The present Directors of the company are Mr Vinay Shashikanth Shinde and Dipson Subhas Bothare.

Profile of the Company :

The Company has been incorporated to provide post production and digital lab Services for features films, Web Series, Short Films, Digital films, and others formats and all other support services related to the same. The company is equipped to provide various services under one roof having unique future to offer end to end services with a strong creative team.

Presently the company is able to provide services like DIT and vaulting, offline edit setup, X Sen Storage, smoke and flame, dubbing, online edit, preview room facility and other services as required by the clients.

Profile of Directors :

Mr Dipson Subhash Bothare has been a director of the company since incorporation and is fully conversant with the activities of the company. Mr Dipson Bothare with more then 18 yearsâ€™ experience in the field of Visual and communications carved a niche for himself in the world of visual story telling. He has become expert in the animated version of the visual communications by virtue of experience in the field for the last so many years.

Mr Vinay Shashikant Shinde is a very Creative person having an experience of 20 years in creative and video editing management with high caliber general management skills. By virtue of his long experience in media industries due to his associatiation with highly successful media companies, he has become synonymous with his proven skills in media, advertising, production, post production and other services.

Apart from the directors, the company is fully backed up by different technically qualified persons to handle different thing as per the needs of the client.

Past performance of the company :

The financial Highlights of the company for the last three years are as given below:

Future Growth :

Though the company is 4 years old and started with a modest beginning of gross revenue of Rs. 8.65 lakhs initially for the FY 2016-17 , the company has achieved gross revenue of Rs. 126.57 lakhs for year ending 31st March 2020

With the latest technology available at its disposal, the company is slowly and steadily capturing the attention of the industry. Due to the innovative techniques adopted, the company is poised to make a rapid progress during in current financial year. With the increase in web series, online visual technology, online educational learning etc. the company has projected to achieve gross revenue of Rs .500 Lakhs in the current financial year ending on 31st March 2021. Presently the company is catering to the needs of the following major customers.

1) Condenest India Pvt Ltd

2) TATA Elxsi Limited

3) Essel Vision Pvt Ltd

4) Byjus Think and learn pvt ltd

5) Via com India Pvt Ltd

6) Colosceum Media Pvt Ltd

With the above companies availing the services of the company on continuous basis, AKC HUB Pvt Ltd is expected to reach the projected target of gross revenue of Rs. 600 Lakhs before the completion of the financial year ending 31st march 2022.
name: Ananta Krriyaa Creative Hub Pvt Ltd
